text.text:
Love the Acai Berry bowl. I customize my order; can't do bananas so I replace with pineapples.
As much as I love it, I can only do one a week. The calorie count is pretty high. The acai berry is 97 calories (per serving as per the sales lady) not to mention the fruits, coconut shavings and the Nutella (love, love, love it). So yeap!, once a week treat.

originalText.text:

text.text: Smoothies are pretty good IF the guy makes it! Big downfall, they don't OPEN up early enough (smoothie on the run for breakfast omw to work) and the WAIT time is kind of annoying unless you pre order through an app. They NEED at least 3 people working. SOMEONE TO TAKE THE ORDERS! And two to expedite the orders and perfect the smoothies so business is booming! Hopefully, they read these reviews and consider help!

text.text:
Pros: close to my house, offers chia and sea moss, SpongeBob smoothie is tasty, love the Hamada salad.
Cons: They RARELY have all the ingredients for the menu items they promote-Like MANGO😒.

originalText.text:
Pros: close to my house, offers chia and sea moss, SpongeBob smoothie is tasty, love the Hamada salad.
Cons: They RARELY have all the ingredients for the menu items they promote-Like MANGO😒.

text.text: Best smoothies in the Bronx, I come here regularly and they make them perfectly every time! I love the Scooby Doo, or even getting single-fruit smoothies like Watermelon or Mango. No additives, always well blended and fresh tasting. Their açaí bowls are also delicious. Such a gem!

originalText.text: Best smoothies in the Bronx, I come here regularly and they make them perfectly every time! I love the Scooby Doo, or even getting single-fruit smoothies like Watermelon or Mango. No additives, always well blended and fresh tasting. Their açaí bowls are also delicious. Such a gem!

text.text: I'm a local who was excited about this neighborhood addition. Very watery strawberry banana smoothie that was McDonald's quality. Tasted like powder, couldn't even tell a banana was added. Very disappointed. Never going back.

originalText.text: I'm a local who was excited about this neighborhood addition. Very watery strawberry banana smoothie that was McDonald's quality. Tasted like powder, couldn't even tell a banana was added. Very disappointed. Never going back.
